title: Textile, early 20th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: resist printed on plain weave
description: Narrow panel fragment printed in blue and black on a white ground showing Japanese characters in the center with four conventionalized leaves and flowers. Ends are blue with symbols in white.
